document.full_text: in the run-up to one of the hottest social media ipos of the year, china's renren inc lowered the number of users it said it gained in the first quarter of 2011, raising questions about the rest of the information it provided to investors in official filings.
document.title: renren revised ipo filing shows slower user growth
lines_and_colors: in the run-up to one of the hottest social media ipos of the year, china's renren inc lowered the number of users it said it gained in the first quarter of 2011, raising questions about the rest of the information it provided to investors in official filings.
